SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ugh, are those exhaust fumes I'm smelling?
I'm guessing it's because of all the smoke
coming out of those buildings.

SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Probably mess you up good if you breathe
too much of it, so let's find us a triangle
and get outta here quick.

SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Well, slap my cheeks and call me a mule!
That smoke looks like a giant bird.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Another accident? Well, great. I suppose this
is going to postpone the beginning of service
yet again. What is our useless pack of engineers
even doing!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You there! What are you staring into
space for? Hurry up and deal with this!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text: Uh, are you looking at us?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I'll see it taken care of, Director.
I've already called Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
There's going to be no end to trouble if you
don't sort this out, Fred. Dealing with the
Anti-Triangle is already enough of a headache—
we don't need more issues in our lives.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And remember this: the Trigon Corporation
has no seats at the table for those who prove
themselves of no use.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sorry about that, friends. The director's been
on edge lately, what with the accidents at
the triangle engines and the appearance
of the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh, I see... You two have come
from somewhere far away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Well then, let me give you the rundown.
Every single machine we have is powered
by something called a 'triangle engine.' These engines are based on a concept
called 'triangle theory,' and require
no fuel of any kind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Well, if the triangle piece we're looking for has
something to do with that—and if triangles are
some fundamental truth of the universe—then
I suppose such a thing is possible.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Indeed. Moving on, the term 'Anti-Triangle'
is a general word we use to describe the
fiends that have started to crop up of late
near our triangle engines. Our current working theory is that these fiends
are attracted to the force fields that surround
the engines, but honestly, the phenomenon
isn't particularly well understood yet.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
So the triangles are tied up with fiends
and the like? Heck, feller, there ain't no
such thing as an engine that can solve
all our energy problems at once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You seem quite well-versed in triangles.
I can see why she's interested...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
I hear we had another accident
with the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Oh, Corana! Great. Now that you're here,
I'll let you sort the situation out.
Work with these women here to repair the
triangle engines, please and thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.text:
All right. Come on, you—we'll start by
making some emergency repairs to the
central terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Emergency repairs are finished.
Things should function without
issue once more after we restore
the entire triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
As the new model of triangle engine
is rather lacking in countermeasures,
sudden loads tend to cause accidents. Also, I've yelled at the Trigon board about
this until I'm blue in the face, but do
they listen to me? Nooo!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
I know telling you won't do any good, but it's
just so frustrating! The director never listens
to a word I say, talking to Fred is pointless,
and you... Well, you happen to be standing here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
There is no time for idle chatter.
We must proceed to the next location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. We'll head to the
triangle engine at the tower at once.
Come along, you two!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TERMINAL_000_CUT_010_0.text: Do they think we work for Trigon?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text: Is that fiend one of the Anti-Triangle?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You don't know about the Anti-Triangle?
Are you new hires or something?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We were passing by when we heard the explosion
and came to see what happened—and then someone
apparently thought we worked here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh? Hm. Sorry about that; I thought you
were Trigon Corporation employees. Still,
that doesn't explain why Fred had you come.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text:
He actually knew we weren't employees right
out of the chute; said something about how
we'd come from a long ways off.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, we'll have to deal with these
fiends before we keep chatting!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_000.text:
System reinitialization is complete,
and the restart process is underway.
We should return to normal output shortly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_010.text:
Is the Anti-Triangle the cause of all the
problems with the triangle engines?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_020.text:
The Anti-Triangle doesn't attack the triangle
engines—it just steals energy from them.
But eventually it steals so much that
the engines overload and shut down.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_030.text:
Usually I can't count on a word Fred says,
but it looks like he wasn't wrong about my
bringing the two of you along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_040.text:
Since all the other triangle engines are
currently in shutdown mode, I need to
go around and restart them all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_050.text:
I'd normally have to wait until Trigon sent out
a special team to deal with the Anti-Triangle,
but with you two and Master at my side,
we should be able to proceed without issue.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Maybe the triangle we need is in one'a
them engines? Couldn't hurt for us to go
around restartin' the things while we look.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_080.text:
And having an expert with us means
we might be able to find it even faster.
So yes, Corana. Count us in.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_090.text:
That would be wonderful, thank you.
And in return, I'll do what I can to help you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_100.text:
A fine plan. Now let us head to the next site;
as soon as we have three repaired engines,
we can link them into a more efficient
tandem known as a 'triangle network.'

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_010_110.text:
So since we already have the terminal and
the tower reactivated, we just need to pick
one more place that makes a triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This looks like a plain old cave.
Is there actually a triangle engine
set up in this place?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Not according to the data I have on hand.
That said, the place is indeed part of
the triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Welcome to Mural Ruins. I'm Barbara,
and I conduct research on the murals here.
I heard we had some unusual guests coming,
but didn't know Dr. Sitrix had assistants!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hi there. I'm Formina, and we're working
with Master to fix the triangle engines.
What's the story with these ruins?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
This is the place where Alessa and Corana—
the Sitrix sisters—invented triangle theory.
Supposedly they were inspired by the murals,
but that could just be a myth.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Regardless, I'm hoping to unravel the true
meaning behind the murals by investigating
the various pieces that remain here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I would also like to see the mural
that Dr. Corana Sitrix saw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I was created by Dr. Alessa Sitrix based
upon the principles of triangle theory.
I know nothing of the time prior to my
initial origination.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh dear. You see, that mural is located
deep inside the cave, and I am not sure
I can actually guide you there. You'll probably want to consult with Corana;
it's a complicated route, but I'm sure BX10
won't have any trouble recalling it once
she implants it in his memory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_100.text:
We might be able to learn something about
the triangles we're looking for there, so let's
give it a go.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I wish to see the place where triangle theory
was born. The reason behind this is something
more akin to human sentimentality than logic,
but either way, I feel the need to go there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_000_CUT_000_120.text: Then let's head for Corana's lab.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
We heard there's a mural in the ruins that
helped you come up with triangle theory.
Would you mind telling us how to find it?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
There are more than a few factual inaccuracies
there, but I'll let that go for now. More to the
point, however, you can't visit the mural.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Because it turned into the Vermillion Bird and
flew away. That event was the impetus for our
research into triangle theory, which posits that
arrays of triangles can produce energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
I exist because doctors Corana and Alessa Sitrix
went into that cave, and would like to see it for
myself so I might decide whether or not it is a
truly special place.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Please help us. There might be something
in there that helps us find the triangle
piece we're looking for.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_GOLAB_000_CUT_000.text:
Very well. In that case, I will record
the location data in Master's memory
so he can guide you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes, we've got the data.
Master, lead the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text: Do you mind if I come along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Not at all. Just take care not
to get lost along the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Huh. The mural's gone,
just like Corana said.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Wait, it's gone!? Why didn't you say that
BEFORE we tromped all the way here!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Ah, yes. I also see a triangular
fragment on the ground.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Doesn't seem like it's resonating, which means
it's not the one we're looking for—but maybe
we can put it into the indentation.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Though faint, I am detecting energy. 
This is a triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Barbara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_CAVE_END_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, but this raises so many questions!
Did this occur naturally, or did ancient
people already know about triangle theory!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_000.text:
There's a triangle engine
in use at the dam?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The dam's hydraulic power generation
is used to make the triangle engine
more efficient. It is one of Dr. Alessa Sitrix's earliest
works—such a large-scale apparatus
would not be made today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_020.text:
A'yup. And since it's so old,
maintenance is a real pain.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_030.text:
While the procedure to restart this engine
is not complicated, it takes a good deal of
time due to the size of the dam. As such,
I recommend we prioritize other locations.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Actually, I can handle it if you give me
the details. I mean, it IS my job as the
foreman of the dam and all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Very well. Remember these steps.
First, you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...And if you repeat that sequence,
everything should work out.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Woof! That's a lot more work than I
was expecting. But I'll get 'er done,
don't you worry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Took a while, but I finally managed
to get everything restarted.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Thanks for showing me how, by the way!
Probably a good thing for me to know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_DAM_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
The repairs for this
location are complete.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_000.text:
People keep saying things are being
purified, but the pollution around here
is clearly getting WORSE, not better.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I mean, these people are
all off their nuts, right!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Exactly—and that's why we need
to ACTUALLY purify things!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So you're on their side too,
tree haters!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_000_CUT_000_060.text:
With that man gone,
we can restart the engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Silvano
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_FOREST_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Today we're gonna do some
REAL purification!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Goodness, but that's an unusual fashion sense
you're sporting! Got time to chat? I'd love
to pick your brains and see if it can maybe
lead to developing some new products.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text: You wanna talk fashion? Ask away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Thank you. Tell me, what do you think
is missing from your current ensemble?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Hmm... Maybe a watch? A stylish, cute one—
Oh, but not too flashy, because I want to
be able to wear it on the job. Also, it'd be great if it were small
and light enough that I could forget
I even have it on most of the time.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Does the Trigon Corporation even have the
technology to develop a triangle engine
small enough to be worn on the wrist?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
Don't underestimate us! Why, your circuits
would be scrambled if you saw what was
going on at the company's R&D facility!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_000_CUT_000.text:
A facility that researches triangle engines, huh?
The triangle artifact we're looking for could be
somewhere in that mix, so we'll absolutely take
you up on the field trip.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text: Too big. Not cute. No thanks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
Director! I'm working on a prototype that
utilizes a small-scale triangle engine,
but it appears it's still too large.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
The miniaturized triangle engine is a nut
countless individuals before you have
tried and failed to crack.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTOWER_000.text:
We need more practical product concepts.
Try asking for Fred's opinion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Say there, Fred! So I'm trying to develop a
wristwatch that utilizes a miniature triangle
engine, but I just can't seem to get the thing
small enough. Do you have any ideas?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Miniaturizing a triangle engine is something
best left to pure geniuses like Alessa.
Sadly, she was never interested in that
kind of research.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Agreed. Dr. Alessa Sitrix's research interests
shifted away from improving the triangle engine
itself and toward the development of the
BX series—which concluded with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
She doesn't much care about machines.
In the end, Alessa thinks about Alessa,
and that's it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
You make it sound like
she's still like that.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, sorry. Did I give that impression?
No, I'm afraid Alessa has passed on.
I was speaking of things in the past.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Oh, and this is merely a thought,
but what if you pursued an air purifier
instead of this wristwatch?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
The technological capabilities of the Trigon
Corporation allow us to manufacture large-
scale products with ease, you see. And if we develop products that are meant
for factories and not individuals, we can
sell them at an even higher price.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Ah, I see! So rather than trying to force the
miniaturization work, I should make use of our
existing technology on products that need it!
I think I've seen the light as an engineer.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_GOTERMINAL_.text:
Great. Then go work hard so you
can earn the director's approval.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
Thanks to you, we sold
a ton of air purifiers!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_END_000_CUT.text:
And by installing them in this area,
the triangle network has been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Nello
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_INDUSTRIAL_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Residential and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears the triangle network repairs
are proceeding smoothly. Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_010.text:
No worries—we're looking for triangles
of our own, so it's sort of on the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The emergence of the Anti-Triangle...
The severing of the triangle network...
The failure of triangle engines... My sister and I battled these problems
since we first came up with triangle
theory, but its value to the world
has been worth any amount of pain. Or at least, that is very much
what I want to believe...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_030.text:
You don't look so good—I think you should
rest for a bit. Can't your sister help you?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_040.text:
...Alessa passed away in an accident
some ten years ago.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_050.text: Ah. I'm sorry to hear that.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_060.text:
There's no need to apologize; honestly,
I still have a hard time believing it.
I keep thinking she'll show up one day—
she did always love her little pranks.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_070.text:
It doesn't help that the details of her
accident are maddeningly unclear. In fact,
the only witness was Fred, who was her
assistant at the time. Alessa's old laboratory is still in the
basement of the terminal, but not even
I am allowed in there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_080.text: Speaking of Fred, what's he like?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You'd have to ask him about that.
For now, you can leave the triangle
engine in this place to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_100.text:
It sounds like there's some circumstances
that you don't really want to talk about.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Fred and I were once...together.
So if I seem reluctant to discuss
the man, that's why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Fred, you were Alessa's assistant, right?
What kind of research was she doing?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I was her assistant when she was researching
the BX series—the results of which are
standing next to you now. We wanted to apply triangle theory to AI.
Alessa had grown dissatisfied researching
triangle engines, you see, and sought to
use the theory with different applications.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Honestly, Alessa was just quick to lose interest
in things. Once a subject started going well,
she'd drop it like a hot potato and move on to
something new and exciting. Gave me a bit of whiplash as her assistant,
but that was nothing compared to the messes
her sister Corana had to clean up.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
That has nothing to do with you two.
Why are you even asking?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
We heard a rumor she's still alive,
and figured if anyone knew about that,
it would be you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
Ugh. This conversation is dredging up some
things I would much sooner forget. She was
so horribly disfigured in that accident,
and I just... I can't...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I'm sorry, but my inability to handle this
is why I broke up with Corana, and I really
have no interest in discussing it further.
I'll take my leave now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
It appears there really was an accident,
but Fred also seems to be hiding something.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.text:
I am not capable of such intuitive judgments.
So long as the cause and details of the
accident remain unknown, Dr. Alessa Sitrix's
death cannot be confirmed conclusively. My analysis of our conversation just now
also supports that assessment.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_GOTERMINAL_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I've finished repairing the laboratory's
triangle engine. Now tell me, how did
your conversation with Fred go?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
I have a better idea of his disposition but
I couldn't get a read on anything else.
Well, other than the fact he seems to
be hiding something, that is.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Then you and I have arrived
at the same conclusion. Honestly, I felt that way even when we lived
together. Though we were partners, I never
once felt love for the man. It was more like...
Well, like I had to comfort him in Alessa's stead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_03.text: I know that kind of thing can happen.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
...Forgive me. It's water under the bridge.
There are things that need doing in the here
and now, and that's what I should attend to.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_000.text:
The triangle network restoration seems
to be proceeding apace; the skies look
that much prettier.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Er, do they? Because I feel like
they just keep getting smokier.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_020.text:
You're an odd one, aren't you? This 'smoke,'
as you call it, is proof that life is growing
richer. Also, when I look at a sky and see
only blue, it makes me profoundly uneasy. Just look at all that smog! Doesn't it make you
feel like you're being embraced by something warm
and comforting? In this way, our engines give
not only physical happiness, but peace of mind.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Fair enough. A more pressing issue, though,
is that we recently saw the Anti-Triangle
fail to absorb some triangle energy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_040.text:
That seems rather unlikely, but I suppose
I've no choice but to believe you.
Can you give any more details?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_050.text:
They seemed like all the other
Anti-Triangle we've seen, honestly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, what about the area around it?
If the Anti-Triangle itself hasn't changed,
perhaps something in the surroundings did.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The triangle network around the
Anti-Triangle had been restored.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It was like they tried to absorb energy
from the engine, but were unable to.
After that, they vanished.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_090.text:
Interesting... So if the Anti-Triangle is
caught in a triangle network, it protects
the engines and gives us an opening to
exterminate the beasts.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Huh. Okay then. I guess that means we should
try to restart engines in a way that encloses
the Anti-Triangle in the resulting triangles.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_LAB_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Exactly so. Oh, but this is very exciting!
Now that we understand more about the
Anti-Triangle, we might be able to prevent
it from appearing entirely.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello. We'd like to take a look
at your triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Get outta here! If I can't use any water
from the dam, I can't get any work done!
Now go on! Beat it! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems like my son's good work has led to the
restoration of the dam's triangle engine.
What a chip off the old block! Gah ha ha!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_010.text:
That's great. On that note, we'd like
to examine the triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Nope! I'm busy gettin' the thing up
and running again. Go on, now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Why won't this man listen to us?
He should be concerned about the fact
his engine is no longer functioning.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Maybe he's just weird about strangers?
Let's go talk to his son and see if he's more
cooperative when it comes to family.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Excuse me. Your father is the man
in charge of the mines, yes?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Oh no! Is he causing you trouble?
I'm so sorry.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
No need to apologize. We just need to
examine the triangle engine at the mine,
but he keeps turning us away.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
*sigh* I'm afraid he's always been like this.
See, my father is an incredibly competitive
man who always tries to do everything himself. This leads to a vicious circle where it
becomes harder and harder to ask for help
once he realizes he's in over his head.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text:
Would you be willing to ask him for us?
We'd like to help him out if we can.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_GODAM_010_CUT_000.text: Of course. I'll go there right now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: I'm busy with work! Go on now! Git!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Son! What brings you here?
That dam still purrin' right along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes, but only because these folks here helped
to repair the triangle engine. Think you could
maybe let them do the same here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Help!? I don't need no gosh-durned help!
Ain't nobody know this mine better'n me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
YOU might be fine with that, but what about all
the other people working here? If the triangle
engine isn't fixed soon, they won't be able
to support their families.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text: Okay, fine. What if I help you instead of some stranger?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: Teo_Senior
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
Well, sure! I'd never turn down
help from m'own son.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.speaker: DamMaster_Teo
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_0.text:
A'yup, I think we're ready to get things
up and running here. The process is the
same as it was at the dam, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_MINE_END_010_CUT_000_1.text:
Yes, that will work fine. The engine here
is of the same antiquated construction as
the one located at the dam.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So this amusement park also
runs on a triangle engine?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It does. Dr. Corana Sitrix is always saying
that we must also use the power of triangle
engines to make the children happy.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_020.text:
She's got big dreams, doesn't she?
...Er, hold on. Something's not right.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Help! Heeelp! The triangle engine
is out of control and we can't shut
down any of the rides!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Master, where's the emergency shutdown
button for the triangle engine!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_050.text:
So far as I know, there is no such function.
This is the first time something of this nature
has happened, and my database files do not
possess a clear solution. We might be able to stop it by absorbing the
triangle energy and inducing an overload on
the system, but with the triangle network
severed, we have no means to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_060.text: Oh! That gives me an idea!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_000_CUT_000_070.text:
We're gonna lure the Anti-Triangle
straight to the amusement park!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sort of an all-or-nothing plan, but at least
it worked out. I guess even the Anti-Triangle
can have their uses.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I will forward this data to Dr. Corana Sitrix.
The information regarding both the park's engine
running wild and its subsequent stabilization
should prove valuable research data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Oh wow, you know Dr. Sitrix? When I was a kid,
she gave me a toy that was powered by triangle
energy. That's actually the whole reason I
started working here in the first place!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix's dream is blossoming
splendidly. She really should have more
confidence in what she's doing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PARK_END_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Technology is all about
how you use it, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_000.text:
It is good to see you again, Michele.
Would you mind if I took care of
restarting the triangle engine here?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Michele

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Michele here was one of Dr. Corana Sitrix's
colleagues at the laboratory—and the one she
had the greatest number of conversations with.
Clearly she was enamored with him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_040.text:
My analysis judged you to be the most
suitable partner for Dr. Corana Sitrix.
Why did you not act on this?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Because Corana was too busy hooking up
with Fred, of all people. Why she did that
I'll never know, especially considering he
and Alessa were an item!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_060.text: Er... Right. Sorry. Back to work.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_070.text:
You should go say hello to Dr. Corana Sitrix
once in a while, Michele; while I can help her
with this kind of work, what she truly needs
is a partner with whom she can share her life.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I want to, Master—I really do.
I just... Well, I can't.
Call it a human failing, I guess.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You're as handy as ever, Master!
We got that wrapped up in no time. I'm also really glad we got to catch up.
Er, and if you don't mind, would you
tell Corana that I'm doing all right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_100.text: I will be certain to do so.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_PORT_000_CUT_000_110.text:
It's great that you can just ask people stuff
without hesitation, Master. I mean, I sort of
wanted to dig into that situation myself!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_000_CUT_000_020.text:
The animals have escaped!
Please help me get them back!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I'll handle repairing the triangle engine.
You go catch the animals.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I think this should be
all of the animals.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You took enough time that I was
able to finish the repairs here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sure wish we could use triangle theory
to create a breed of animal that actually
LISTENS when you call them...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix feels it unethical to apply
triangle theory to living creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Just be careful they don't
get away from you again.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Melania
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RANCH_END_000_CUT_000_.text: I will! And thank you again.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
We'd like to take a look at the
triangle engine for this area.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Sorry, but there's a customer in the building
that houses the triangle engine, so you can't
go near it right now. They're demanding that we purge the
pollution as quickly as possible—and
between you and me, I hope it happens
soon, because they are VERY annoying.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
They're even saying that the end of days is
approaching because we aren't handling the
pollution correctly. Talk about a buzzkill!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_000_CUT_000.text:
Given this information, we should
deal with other locations first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_010_CUT_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Commercial Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Hello there. I'm with the Trigon
Infrastructure Department.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
We'd like to examine the
triangle engine here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
Oh, are you here to repair it!?
Thank the stars!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: TRIGON_Beppe
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text:
People keep contacting us with
all these wild complaints,
and I'm just at my wits' end!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_SETTLEMENT_020_CUT_000.text: I will deal with it at once.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hello! I'm with the Trigon Sales Department!
Would you like to try out one of our newest
products absolutely free of charge!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Great! First of all, this is a sensor that
utilizes triangle energy to locate
places that will boost your spirit.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Even the end of days is nothing to
worry about when you have this baby!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much for your interest!
Aaand...here you go. I went ahead and
just turned it on for you there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, I hate it when people turn down
a good deal... But hey, your loss!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_BATTLE_000_CUT_0.text:
Is this really going to
'boost our spirits'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_BATTLE_020_CUT_0.text:
My sensors are not picking up
anything at this location.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Your device led us to three places,
and we were attacked in each one.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, but you're SO much
stronger now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I did find it interesting,
so I suppose it's all good.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.speaker: BX10_EX
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_END_000_CUT_000_.text:
You should probably hold off on selling
that thing to the general public.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: TRIGON_Stella
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_TRADE_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I've heard from my colleagues in the
Industrial and Residential Wards,
and we're going to purify this area!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RECLEAN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
We've already repaired this engine,
so restarting it is a simple matter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: That's Fred. Where could he be going?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
He appears to be headed to the basement
level of the terminal. Perhaps he is going
to the laboratory of Dr. Alessa Sitrix
that her sister mentioned.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text: Well, now I'm curious. Let's follow him.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
...Yes, everything is proceeding apace.
Additionally, the women we spoke of
before are proving to be quite useful.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
I think he's talking to someone
about me and Bonnie?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
There's a 50 percent probability
that the person he is speaking
to is Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
As I said, there is only a 50 percent
probability. This is, however, an
assumption based on my analytics.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
If the person he spoke to was, in fact,
Alessa, we should simply ask her
about the plan.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
But you're only 50 percent sure, right?
In that case, we'll just let him do his thing
and keep an eye out for whatever he does.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
We should share this information
with Dr. Corana Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_000_CUT_0.text:
Not yet. We don't want to tell her that her
sister's alive if it might not be the case.
Let's try to get more information first.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is in the central
terminal. I do not know why.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text: Are you able to tell where people are?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
I am Dr. Corana Sitrix's assistant;
I must always be aware of her actions.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
So wouldn't you be able to tell
where Alessa is, too?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Correct. My last reading that seemingly
detected her was our first contact
since the accident.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Huh. Yeah, we definitely need to
gather more information here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It's true that I lack the data to infer the truth
of the situation. However, if Dr. Corana Sitrix
has discovered something in the terminal,
we may be able to supplement said data.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
You must let me see Alessa's laboratory,
Fred; I have to know if there are any
papers on triangle theory there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This again, Corana? All remaining data has
been released to the public through the
Trigon Corporation. There's nothing there.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
But you of all people know how she was:
there might be notes or writings or
seemingly random doodles that could
turn out to be a breakthrough! Other people would simply overlook
that kind of thing, but I won't.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Look, I know I've always come across as a kind
of idiot luddite to you genius Sitrix sisters,
but Alessa's lab is owned by the Trigon
Corporation, and I'm in charge of it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
So no, Corana. You can't go in.
Now turn around and go home.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Ugh. One of these days, she's just going to
force her way in even if it means destroying
the entrance. We really need to deal with this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
This exchange has happened many times
between the two of them, and this
instance provided no new information.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
Seems like Corana really doesn't know anything
about this—and Fred's sure in a hurry to do...
Well, something. Also, he has us running around
repairing the triangle engines for some reason?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_010_CUT_0.text:
It would seem he has a plan
we are not fully aware of.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Something is going on here:
the terminal's energy level is rising.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
I wonder if Fred's having
another private chat.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
We should determine if it is
Dr. Alessa Sitrix.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text: No. We have other things to do.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So the travelers of the Conjoined Worlds have
been lured in at last! I have been trying to
ascertain if you would be friends or foes,
but see now that you are clearly the latter.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
You'll rue the day you
interfered with me!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
So you're the one who created
the Anti-Triangle!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Master, was that Alessa? And was she really
the one who sent the Anti-Triangle to mess
with the triangle networks?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
You still don't have enough
information to make a call?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
No. 50 percent of that woman is
Dr. Alessa Sitrix. The remaining
50 percent is something else.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Whatever's going on, it clearly runs deep.
And before you ask, I still think we should
hold off on telling Corana. There's no reason
to get her caught up in all of this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_020_CUT_0.text:
Oh. It's you two. Look, I know there's been
a lot of work recently, what with all the
various problems cropping up, but please
continue the repairs as fast as you can.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: Ignore it—we need to get to the terminal.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text: It's been a long time, Master.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
We know you created the Anti-Triangle and sent
it to mess with the triangle networks, Alessa—
but why? What are you trying to accomplish?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
You think you know much, travelers,
but you know nothing. The Anti-Triangle is a natural formation
caused by triangle energy. I was merely using
them to make the true dangers of the triangle
network known to Corana.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
This is the first I've heard
of any kind of danger.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Oh, triangle theory itself is perfectly safe.
Unexpected things happen, however, when
energy is amplified through a triangle network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
Are you saying this world is
in serious danger right now?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_ALESSAAGHOST_030_CUT_0.text:
It is indeed—and not even I can
predict what might happen next.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
We finished repairing all
of the triangle engines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix is headed for the central
terminal, where it appears they are planning
to hold a ceremony.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Yes. The energy level near the
central terminal is spiking.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_COMPLETE_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Sure don't seem like they're gettin' ready to
throw a hootenanny on account of the repairs
bein' finished! We'd best hoof it on over to
the terminal and see what's what.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
What's the deal with this ceremony, Corana?
Having it ready moments after we finished
repairing the engines takes serious planning.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
The director of the Trigon Corporation
informed me about an important ceremony
I had to attend. That's all I know.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! Today is a
momentous day in our history: every triangle
engine is now functioning, which means the
triangle network is complete! Yes, this is a day of new beginnings—
not only for all of you, but also for
everyone who could not be with us today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Now, let us beckon the Supreme Being unto us.
I daresay none among you will be unfamiliar
with her name...Doctor Alessa Sitrix!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Greetings, everyone. Let me begin with this:
I'm aware that many of you believed I was
killed in a tragic accident—and in reality,
that is not far from the truth. But thanks to the energy generated
by the triangle network, I have
been able to return to this world.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Henceforth, I will be resuming the work that
was interrupted by my accident—the work of
applying triangle theory to living creatures. I will offer up my body as a test subject
once more. But this time, we have more than
sufficient amounts of triangle energy,
which means I cannot fail.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_070.text:
In a moment, I will stand upon this stage as a
new form of life: the Supreme Being. And once
this is done, all of you will be transmuted
into triangle energy and become one with me. Please know it will be the great honor
of my life to guide you all in this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Have you gone utterly mad, Alessa!?
That's not what triangle theory is for! What about all the times we talked about
using it to help people!? To be of service
so they could live happier lives!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you and I not completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today. But this is a happy moment, Corana!
You are about to become a part of
the Supreme Being—a part of ME.
Does this not fill you with joy?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_100.text:
This can't seriously be the reason
Trigon was created.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All that the Trigon Corporation does
is for the sake of the great Alessa—
and we offer our all unto her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_120.text:
No. I can't believe that. Fred, did YOU know
about all of this when you asked us to help
repair the triangle engines?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_130.text:
All is as Alessa foresaw, for she said the two
of you would be the last piece of the puzzle.
Oh yes! She is my goddess, and I seek nothing
more in this life than to be of service to her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_140.text:
If it turns out you have the triangle
artifact we need, I am going to be
INCREDIBLY annoyed.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_150.text:
I saw how you two were guided by the emerald
light, and knew it would lead you here. Thus was
I assured of my destiny, for your arrival is the key
to advancing these events!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Lady, there is no way in hell we're
going to become one with you. Corana, go cut off the triangle network.
...Uh, Corana?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I wish we never saw the Vermillion Bird mural...
I wish we hadn't researched triangle theory...
I wish I'd gone on that date with Michele... I wish I'd never reached out to Fred...
I wish I had never been Alessa's sister...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Stop it, Corana! Wallowing in regret
isn't going to change anything! You're a scientist! You can't just close
your eyes to what's happening here!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Master, I want you to contact everyone
we've spoken to at a triangle engine.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Understood. I will open a line
to all of them simultaneously.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Good. I want you and Corana to figure a way
to cut off the triangle network. We'll keep this
wannabe god busy until you do.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_220.text:
How can you just move forward
like this!? I just... I...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_000_230.text:
You aren't upset that you've been used like this?
That people are about to be robbed of their
happiness for the sake of one person's completely
off-the-wall ambitions? Well, you may be okay with it, but we can't
accept it—and that's why we're gonna fight!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_010_040.text:
We had a dream when we saw the Vermillion
Bird, Corana... And though it didn't come
true today, maybe someday...it...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_000.text:
What'll you do about the
triangle network now?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_010.text:
I've decided to divide the network
into smaller clusters. While this will prevent triangle energy from
becoming too concentrated in one place,
each cluster will also serve to complement
the others and help keep everything in check.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_020.text:
Sounds like that'll lead to a lot of
valuable data—but it also means you'll
never be able to see your sister again.
Are you okay with that?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_030.text:
I am a scientist.
I prioritize data over emotion.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_060.text: Let me help you, Corana. Please.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_070.text:
Michele? Of course you can help!
And, um... Thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_080.text:
And what of the triangle piece you
are searching for? Did you find it?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_090.text:
No—and we have no idea where it could be.
It's sort of nuts that we can't find a triangle in
a world that's full of them, but here we are.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_000_CUT_030_120.text:
You two managed to reform the triangle network
and stop Alessa. Thanks to this, we were able
to protect this world we call Vermiglio.
But now it is time to move on.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_020.text:
This is a ceremony for you, Dr. Sitrix,
so I hope you enjoy yourself. That said,
why are you mingling with our employees?
Looking for a new assistant, perchance?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_030.text:
It'd be more trouble than it's worth
to set this thing straight, so I'm
just going to leave it alone.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Now then, Dr. Alessa Sitrix will be arriving
momentarily, and I suspect it will be a moving
reunion of sisters long-parted. As such, I'll
give you a little time to say your goodbyes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, my dear little sister. You have my thanks
for continuing our research after the accident—
for had you not gone and completed the triangle
network, I wouldn't be standing here today.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_070.text:
I don't understand. Are you...Alessa?
I mean, I'm happy you're alive—truly I am—
but I'm also very confused. What's going on,
and what did she mean by 'saying goodbyes'?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_080.text:
I fear your sister's role ends here.
With the triangle network completed,
I need her to die for real this time.
...Fred? If you would?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_090.text:
Fred, no! The director betrayed me!
She intends to keep all this power
for herself! Get rid of her!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, now THIS is rich! Two beautiful—yet
utterly terrifying—women have made the
same request of me! Must be my punishment
for being so darned handsome.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, Corana, my former flame. Though you're
rather plain, you're smart as a whip—so I trust
you to make a cool-headed choice here. Who should I choose: the director
or your sister? Who dies?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_120.text: Don't even joke about that, Fred!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Ah ah ah! I know what you're trying to say.
Or rather, I knew what you were going to say
without you even saying it. Alessa may have foisted cleaning up
her research onto me, but she IS
your only sister, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Which makes it an obvious choice.
Sorry, Director—I guess you die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_150.text:
You damn, useless drunk! Apparently you
didn't believe me when I said there was
no seat at the table for those who
weren't of use! But so be it. If you can't deal with
Alessa, I'll just do it myself.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_160.text:
Hey, you're the one who handed out the
death sentence. And on that note... Bye!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_170.text:
Well, would you look at that?
I'm the director of Trigon now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_180.text:
The director is dead, but the plan moves on.
Concentrate the energy from the triangle
network into the central terminal, Fred.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_190.text:
That's 'Director,' not 'Fred.' Also,
you don't order me around anymore,
Alessa. The director decides what we're
doing here—and oh gosh, that's ME!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_200.text:
Your eternal life project has, of course,
been canceled. Instead, we'll make a charm
filled with triangle energy and sell it to
customers who crave perpetual youth. And of course, it'll make me RICH!
RICH, I tell ya!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_210.text: I knew you were useless as an assistant, but I never realized you were so stupid.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_220.text:
Well, well! Looks like this day just
earned itself another death sentence! Still, just murdering you outright would be
so BORING, so perhaps I'll try to extract
a little triangle energy out of it!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_240.text:
Dear me, I wonder how long you'll be able to
maintain that form? I mean, you SHOULD show
your sister how brutally disfigured you were 
after the failed experiment, right?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_260.text:
You used triangle theory to evolve yourself
once you saw the success of the BX series.
Sadly, living creatures aren't machines.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_280.text:
Trigon probably isn't long for the world
if this idiot is in charge.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_290.text:
Are you people still here? I have a VERY fun
date planned with the Sitrix sisters here,
so I'd advise you not to get in the way.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_300.text:
Are you also with Quisstatium?
Boy, they are just a gaggle
of sleazebags and lowlifes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_310.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_000_310.text:
We're taking this—consider it compensation for
the work we've done for you. Oh, but we're not
leaving yet, so I think we'll go ahead and get in
your way as well!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_000.text:
You might've thought you were slick,
sneaking around to clandestine meetings
and so forth, but you really don't truly
understand a thing about triangle theory.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_010.text:
I was...drunk? Yes, that's it!
Just a little drunken prank! Er, no! I mean, once I got that triangle,
it made me go all funny in the head!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_020.text:
All the excuses in the world ain't gonna
get you off the hook for murder, darlin'.
We're gonna see you swing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_040.text:
Alessa, why didn't you tell me you were alive?
I don't care what you look like, because you'll
ALWAYS be my sister. So let's try to find a way
to get you back to normal—together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_050.text:
You don't have to console me, Corana.
Triangle theory isn't magic—that which has
been broken can't be put back how it was.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_060.text:
But there MUST be a way, Alessa.
Don't give up—we'll find it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_070.text:
I always did tend to give up on things...
But all right, Corana. If you think this
can be done, I'll follow your lead.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_080.text:
This is the first time you've taken my advice since we
went to the cave mural! I wish you'd tried listening to
me a lot earlier, but I suppose this will have to do.
Let's see the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_090.text:
The greatest sisters in the land
are back in action once more.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_100.text:
The triangle you obtained from Fred is
the one you were searching for all along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_110.text:
Yeah, but if a guy like Fred is a member
of Quisstatium, I have doubts there's
even a point in collecting them.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_111.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_111.text:
We got the triangle artifact by followin'
the green line. Whatever sort of feller
Fred was, I don't think it's got any
bearin' on the value of the triangles.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_120.text:
It is difficult to reconcile a green line
that only you two can see. But your words
are persuasive, so I choose to believe you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_130.text:
Thanks, Master. And now, we've got to get going.
Oh, but before we head out, what do you even
call this world of yours?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_140.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_010_CUT_010_140.text:
This world is known as Vermiglio.
I do not know what it means.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, if it isn't Dr. Sitrix and
our otherworldly travelers! Sorry I confused you for employees before, but
I'm SO impressed by how helpful you've been since
you came here—we were at quite the loss for how
to deal with Alessa's Anti-Triangle creatures.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Well, I suppose it won't hurt to reveal
my entire clever plan now that the
triangle network is complete...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The Trigon Corporation was created to raise the
funds required to complete the triangle network—
and I cannot tell you how proud I was when
Alessa selected me to lead her new company.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_060.text:
But as we approached our goal, Alessa suddenly
wanted to stop the project. Of course, that
would have caused Trigon to collapse—and as
its director, I could not permit such a thing.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Hold on. Alessa died in an accident
shortly after the project started.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh no, Alessa is very much alive;
her 'death' was something she
and Fred came up with. Don't get me wrong—there WAS an accident.
But it didn't kill Alessa.
It just...changed her.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Details, details! Look, I'm not an expert
in triangle theory, so if you want any
actual technical answers, you'll need to
go straight to your sister. All I know is this: Alessa wanted to complete
the triangle network in order to get her
original body back, and Trigon was happy
to help her achieve that goal.
