SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_110.text:
And then? Poof! Her sudden change of heart.
But I don't need to tell YOU about that;
I'm sure you've found yourself tossed about
on the stormy seas of her whims before. Regardless, it was too much to ask—the
livelihoods of Trigon's entire staff
hung in the balance, after all.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_120.text:
So we simply ignored her and went ahead
with the plan—but then she started to
fight back with the Anti-Triangle.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_130.text: But why hide it all this time?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_140.text:
Because if I was unwilling to tell
Corana about her sister, I certainly
wasn't about to tell YOU people. After all, if she learned that her darling
sister opposed the completion of the network,
she would have stopped at nothing to prevent
it from coming to fruition.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_150.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_150.text:
If Alessa is truly alive, I want to see her.
I need to know what she discovered that
made her oppose the network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_160.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_160.text:
Oh, I suspect she'll be making her appearance
shortly. You must have noticed the increase in
energy levels, yes? This is a sign that she's
on her way here right now. You see, the previous explosion at the terminal
was surely her doing, and I expect she intends
to sabotage things once again—but I will NOT
allow that to happen this time!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_190.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_190.text:
Tell me why you opposed the triangle network!
Is there some flaw in triangle theory?
Did you make some kind of new discovery?
Have you maybe... Oh, but listen to me ramble! It's you,
Alessa—and you're ALIVE! My sister is ALIVE!
I'm so happy, and yet all I'm doing is
blabbing on about triangle theory!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_200.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_200.text:
Oh, my dear sister... I was performing
secret research in an attempt to apply
triangle theory to a living creature. And you know what? I learned something:
as triangle energy increases, it has an
effect on the life-forms around it—but the
outcome of such effects are VERY unpredictable.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_210.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_210.text:
That's why I interfered with the project.
But I couldn't tell you, because then my
forbidden research would have become known.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_220.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_220.text: I have already reaped my own just reward. I can hold this form with enough triangle energy, but if the levels drop, I become something far, far worse. And I can't have that, Corana. I won't. I won't let anyone in this world endure the thing that I have become.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_230.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_230.text:
Such beautiful sentiments, Doctor!
Yet with the massive amount of energy
that can be obtained from the triangle
network, we could evolve you even further! I mean, that WAS your plan all along,
was it not? Do be honest now.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_240.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_240.text:
No, you're right. The higher you push
the energy value, the more potential
there is for evolution. But maintaining it at this level is
impossible, because it introduces
mutations in nearby creatures. That's why we have to abort the project,
Corana. We can't allow that to happen—
the people's confidence in the triangle
engines must be maintained.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_250.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_250.text:
OR we can go with my idea instead!
See, the Trigon Corporation won't last
if we don't recoup our investment now. And yes, this will require covering up some
minor inconveniences such as...oh, YOU.
But seeing as you've already died once,
I don't imagine anyone would miss you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_260.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_260.text:
And how are you going to get rid of me?
Will you destroy the triangle network?
That would be pointless—I'll just
destroy the terminal with brute force.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_270.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_270.text:
Oh, I'm well prepared for that.
...Yoo hoo! Fred! I need you!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_280.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_280.text:
Oh, I just used a little mechanization
process on him, and this is the result.
Suits him well, don't you think? I did worry at first if he'd be willing
to defy you, but it seems he has enough
dissatisfaction to express in your
general direction. Do enjoy now!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_281.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_281.text:
That thing is...Fred?
I can't believe this...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_290.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_290.text:
Stop! STOP! Madness like this wasn't
why we researched triangle theory!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_320.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_320.text:
Talk about bungling the moment...
My timing always was off with you...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_340.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_340.text:
Master, get Corana and Michele to safety.
We'll figure something out here.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_350.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_350.text: I know you can do it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_380.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_000_380.text: Better to just fight them both.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_010.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_010.text:
It appears today was not
his day to die.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_020.text: Good. But what about the sisters?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_030.text:
I knew you were hiding something, Alessa,
but I can't believe you actually used
triangle theory on a living creature.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_040.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_040.text:
Once we applied triangle theory to an
artificial intelligence via the BX series,
I simply couldn't contain my curiosity. I started wondering what would happen if we
applied it to a living creature, and had all
confidence it would go swimmingly.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_050.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_050.text:
But on the off-chance I was wrong, I chose
to conduct the experiment on myself.
No one else was harmed, Corana—I swear.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_060.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_060.text:
Alessa, I think we should divide the
network into smaller clusters. While this will prevent triangle energy from
becoming too concentrated in one place, each
cluster will also serve to complement the
others and help keep everything in check. But if we do that, it means...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_070.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_070.text:
That's exactly the kind of solid idea
I'd expect from my genius of a sister—
so don't worry about what happens to me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_080.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_080.text:
I'm sorry, Alessa. I'm SO sorry. I just...
I can't think of any other way to do this.
The only method I can come up with is
the one that...sacrifices you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_090.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_090.text:
I told you not to worry about it, Sis.
I'll always be somewhere in the network,
so I'll always be watching over you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_100.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_100.text:
I'm going to save you someday, Alessa—
I promise. And when I do, we'll go see
the Vermillion Bird together.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_110.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_110.text:
Thank you, Corana.
But now...I must go.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_140.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_140.text:
No, she's not gone. She is here.
And there. And all around us.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_150.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_150.text:
I found this in the place
where you were fighting.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_160.text:
You think Alessa or Fred were haulin'
this around the whole time?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_161.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_020_CUT_010_161.text:
I don't think it matters;
the green line guided us to it.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_000.text:
You must stop this ceremony!
There's no telling what could happen!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, Dr. Sitrix. Today is an auspicious day,
for the triangle network has been completed.
And as we've bested so many obstacles together,
we should similarly celebrate as one.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_020.text:
She's right, Corana. Thanks to our new employees
and Master, we also managed to deal with the
Anti-Triangle. I was hoping to show my formal
thanks, but it seems they took a sick day.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Listen to me, all of you: if the energy
levels in this place increase any further,
the terminal is not going to last.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_040.text: And if we don't put the triangle network into full and complete operation today, Trigon won't last. We'll be ruined. And if that happens, we'll have to start all over again from nothing. Our employees? Their families? They'll all be destitute.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: CEO_TRIGON
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen!
I'm proud to announce that with all
the triangle engines now functioning,
the triangle network is complete! This network will change every aspect
of your lives! The Trigon Corporation
will open the door to tomorrow—today!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I knew something like this could happen.
I managed to stop it once before, but not
this time.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Alessa!? You're alive!?
Where have you been?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_100.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_100.text:
Now is not the time, Doctor. This area
is dangerous, and we must withdraw.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_120.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_120.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix...you remain well...
Now r-run... Run n-n-n-n-nooow...

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_150.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_000_150.text:
Michele, keep an eye on Corana and Master
while we handle things here. While that
might still be the director on the inside,
we can't afford to hold back.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_010.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_010.text:
Fred, you know all about the BX series.
Can you fix Master?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_030.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_030.text:
Huh? What? Oh, right. Well, I could probably
handle wiring up a few connecting circuits,
but fixing broken parts is beyond me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_040.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_040.text:
That's fine. We need to shut down all
the triangle engines at the same time,
which means we have to connect Master
to the network.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_050.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_010_050.text:
Like I said, I'll do what I can.
But, uh, please don't hurt me
if this doesn't work, okay?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_020.text:
Good morning, Dr. Alessa Sitrix,
I will have a double espresso.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_030.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_030.text:
Master, we need you to contact all the triangle
engines on the network and shut them down. There
might be some that have to be stopped manually,
so I'll head back to port. Fred, you're with me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_040.speaker: Fred_Kinlei
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_040.text:
Sorry, we're going to RUN 
all the way to the port!?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_050.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_050.text:
No, you dolt.
You're going to drive.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_060.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_020_060.text:
Hurry, BX10. They won't be
able to do this forever.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_000.text:
The director's been handled.
How are things on your end?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_010.speaker: Corana_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_010.text:
We disabled all the engines,
but the energy here just keeps rising!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_020.speaker: Alessa_Sitrix
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_020.text:
I'll handle it, Corana—for when you get
down to it, this is all my responsibility. Also, I know it was only for a short time,
but I'm truly happy we were able to see
each other again... Farewell.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_130.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_130.text:
You know, I've become fairly used to fiends
and spirits and whatnot, but THAT was
something else entirely. Still, it all seems to have worked out—
thanks to the Vermillion Bird.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_140.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_140.text:
It did not just 'work out.'
You made it happen.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_141.speaker: Michele
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_141.text:
That went even better than I expected,
and we owe it all to the two of you.
You measured up to their expectations
and then some, so thank you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_142.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_142.text:
I don't believe this...
You had it all along?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_150.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_150.text:
So this is the triangle piece you were looking for?
It does indeed exude a different kind of energy
than other triangles.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_BOSS_030_CUT_030_160.text:
Green line took us on one heck of a joyride
this time—but like Michele said, I reckon
it had to go down like that for everything
to work out like it did.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Lara
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Welcome to Dreamland!
Now let us dream together!

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
We should be able to get back to the Twilight
Area if we go through the amusement park's gate.
Thanks for everything you did for us, Master.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Is this Twilight Area a place
similar to Dreamland?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
We don't see it that way, but it's entirely
possible that someone else could. In fact,
I wonder how it might look to you.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_031.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_031.text:
Easy there, darlin'! Corana's gonna be
madder'n a wet het if you go poachin'
her assistant like this.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: BX10_EX
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Dr. Corana Sitrix has found a suitable
partner, and will be well without me.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text: Even so, we can't take you along.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Farewell to you, Master.
And farewell, Vermiglio.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Does this mean that Master
was manipulating us?

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.text:
No, he wasn't lying—I think he trusted us.
If we'd asked him if he's with Quisstatium,
he'd have given us an honest yes.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Yeah, true. Plus, we were able to help 
protect this world, so I reckon you and 
me did a mighty fine job in the end.

SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W15_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Almost too good to be true, isn't it?
Anyway, farewell to you, Vermiglio.
